data.name: NoLogoText
data.comment: Text shown when service logo is not available

data.name: ImportFromServiceTitle
data.comment: Modal title for importing from a service. {0} is placeholder for service name

data.name: UploadExportFileText
data.value: Carregar seu arquivo de exportação de {0}:
data.comment: Text for file upload instruction. {0} is placeholder for service name

data.name: CancelButton
data.comment: Cancel button text

data.name: BackButton
data.comment: Back button text

data.name: NextButton
data.comment: Next button text

data.name: ImportButton
data.comment: Import button text

data.name: ImportFoldersLabel
data.comment: Checkbox label for importing folder structure from the source password manager

data.name: FoldersDetected
data.comment: Info text showing number of folders detected in the import. {0} is the count

data.name: DuplicateCredentialsWarning
data.value: {0} credencial(is) duplicada(s) foram encontradas e não serão importadas.
data.comment: Warning text when duplicate credentials are detected. {0} is the count

data.name: NoNewCredentials
data.value: Nenhuma credencial foi encontrada para importar.
data.comment: Warning text when no new credentials are available for import

data.name: PreviewInstructions
data.value: Verifique se as seguintes credenciais encontradas parecem corretas antes de continuar:
data.comment: Instructions shown before the credential preview table

data.name: ServiceColumn
data.comment: Column header for service name in credential preview table

data.name: UsernameColumn
data.comment: Column header for username in credential preview table

data.name: PasswordColumn
data.comment: Column header for password in credential preview table

data.name: MoreCredentials
data.comment: Text showing additional credentials not displayed. {0} is the count

data.name: ExtractFaviconsLabel
data.value: Extrair ícones de favorito dos serviços com URLs
data.comment: Checkbox label for favicon extraction option

data.name: ConfirmImportText
data.value: Tem certeza que você deseja importar ({0}) credenciais? Nota: o processo de importação pode levar algum tempo.
data.comment: Confirmation text before importing. {0} is the credential count

data.name: FaviconExtractionNote
data.value: Nota: extração de ícones de favorito está habilitado. Este processo pode levar vários minutos dependendo do número de credenciais com URLs. Por favor, mantenha a página aberta.
data.comment: Warning note about favicon extraction duration

data.name: ExtractingFavicons
data.comment: Progress text during favicon extraction. {0} is current progress, {1} is total

data.name: SavingCredentials
data.comment: Progress text during credential save. {0} is current progress, {1} is total

data.name: SyncingVault
data.comment: Progress text when syncing vault to server after import

data.name: ImportSuccessMessage
data.comment: Success message after import completes. {0} is the credential count

data.name: ImportErrorGeneric
data.value: An error occurred during import. Please try again.
data.comment: Generic error message when import fails

data.name: ImportErrorInvalidFile
data.value: Please select a valid export file to import.
data.comment: Error message when invalid file is selected

data.name: ImportErrorZipFile
data.value: Please unzip the export file before importing. See the instructions below for more information.
data.comment: Error message when user tries to import a zip file

data.name: ImportErrorFileTooLarge
data.comment: Error message when file is too large
